module.name: gift
module.summary: giFT peer to peer file sharing tool

template.name: gift_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the gift module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for gift client sessions and gift daemons.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.
